entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
